FeaturedArticle.title: Military Reforms as a Diplomatic Bargaining Chip
FeaturedArticle.subtitle: French-Ottoman Relations at the End of the Eighteenth Century
FeaturedArticle.book: in: European Revolutions and the Ottoman Balkans Nationalism, Violence and Empire in the Long Nineteenth-Century, Editor: Dimitris Stamatopoulos

Interests.title: History
Interests.description: My major research interests are directed towards the European models of modernization of the Ottoman Empire during the Eighteenth Century, as well as toward the European-Ottoman relations interconected with those modernization processes.

Interests.title: Translation Studies
Interests.description: I am tempted to explain the strategies to translate the “untranslatability”: lacunas or liguistic gaps. Part of my research interest in focused on explaining the ways to translate the culture-specific material elements or realia.

Interests.title: Translation
Interests.description: I take pride in being a published translator, when in 2013 I took part in translating a section of Pierre Michon's book Corps du roi. My prefered language pair is French-Bulgarian.

Profile.description: Hi, my name is Antoaneta. I was born in Sofia, but at some point of my live I had the opportunity to live in two of the most intriguing cities of the world: Paris and Istanbul. I reached to these cities because of the desire to read more than anyone else in the world and even to read what no-one has read before me. This dream was fully accomplished when in 2015 I worked on creating the inventory of the Archive of the American Board of Missions. At that time I was the first one who opened some of the documents, forgotten long ago.

Research.title: Army Advisors and Diplomacy. French-Ottoman Relations in the Eighteen Centiry

Research.title:: The Koreen Novel Catfish by Kim Joo-young
Research.description: In 2008 I received an award for essay based on this novel, granted by the Korean Studies Department at the Sofia University and KLTI - Korean Literature Translation Institue

Research.title:: Award for achievements in the field og culture
